item.title: Search Engine
item.description:
Search Engine 个人项目

This project is a personal interest project. Search for words about Japanese, postal code numbers, subway routes, geographical locations, etc.

item.title: About Flask
item.description:
Flask

Flask is a micro web framework written in Python. It is classified as a microframework because it does not require particular tools or libraries.
